STATIC_text.text:
In this chapter you will encounter many of the most common suffixes in the medical language. As you work through the entire book, these suffixes will appear often. An additional group of suffixes is presented in Chapter 6.

Additional combining forms are presented in this chapter to use in making words with suffixes. Your mastery of this material and your analysis of the words in the section on Suffixes and Terminology will increase your medical language vocabulary.
